name: Ultra-Luxe floor manager
descriptions: The Ultra-Luxe floor manager, simply named White Glove in game, is the floor manager for the Ultra-Luxe casino in 2281.

The Ultra-Luxe floor manager will give the Courier gifts from the casino as a reward for winning a certain amount of chips. After one wins enough chips, the floor manager will approach them and tell them that they're still welcome in the hotel but won't be allowed to gamble anymore.

topics.response_text: {Small Fry}I must say, fortune seems to be with you of late. Please, enjoy this, compliments of the White Glove Society.
For a while, you were the toast of the Ultra-Luxe, but you're simply not en vogue any longer. Your act has gotten stale.
You're still welcome to dine with us, of course. We've just had quite enough of paying you to play our games.
